sections.label: Urban/Wastewater virome
sections.query: (virome OR "viral metagenomics") AND (wastewater OR sewage OR "built environment" OR urban)

sections.label: Metagenomics methods
sections.query: metagenomics AND (benchmark* OR pipeline OR "quality control" OR assembly OR classification)

items.title: Not all vaginal microbiomes are equal: functional context shapes immune landscapes.
items.authors: Amanda Williams, Amaury Maros, Michael T France, Jacques Ravel, Johanna B Holm
items.abstract_snippet: Taxonomic classification alone fails to capture the ecological and functional diversity of vaginal microbiomes, particularly those dominated by

items.title: High-efficiency methane consumption by atmospheric methanotrophs in subsurface karst caves: The irrefutable methane sink.
items.authors: Xiaoyan Liu, Xiaoyu Cheng, Yiming Zhang, Rui Zhao, Weiqi Wang, Yang Li
items.abstract_snippet: Subsurface karst systems represent substantial but underexplored methane sinks, yet the identities and activities of cave-dwelling methanotrophs remain poorly characterized. We detected increased methane oxidation rates from 2.9 ± 0.1 to 90.7 ± 4.5 ng·g

items.title: Characterization of the gut microbiota in patients with stage III colorectal cancer: A case-control study.
items.authors: Mahamane T Diakité, Shan Sun, Anou M Somboro, Brehima Diakité, Amadou Koné, Yaya Kassogué
items.abstract_snippet: To conduct a case-control study (pilot study) in Africa (Mali) in comparing the gut microbiota of patients with stage III colorectal cancer (CRC) using next-generation sequencing.

sections.label: Influenza evolution
sections.query: (influenza OR flu) AND (evolution OR "positive selection" OR "antigenic drift" OR clade)

sections.label: H5N1 / avian influenza
sections.query: H5N1 OR "highly pathogenic avian influenza" OR HPAI

items.title: Integrated approaches to explore temporal-spatial changes in gene reassortment of highly pathogenic avian influenza A(H5) virus in Eurasia, 2000-2023.
items.authors: Bo-Jia Chen, Chun-Chen Liang, Yao-Tsun Li, Ting-Wu Chuang, Hong-Dar Isaac Wu, Day-Yu Chao

items.title: Detecting Influenza A(H5N1) Viruses through Severe Acute Respiratory Infection Surveillance, Cambodia.
items.authors: William W Davis, Kathrine R Tan, Borann Sar, Alyssa Finlay, Heng Seng, Vicheth Long
items.abstract_snippet: Of 19 human cases of avian influenza A(H5N1) virus infection detected during January 2023-March 2025 in Cambodia, 12 (63%) were detected directly by surveillance for severe acute respiratory infection (SARI) or indirectly by testing ill close contacts. SARI su…
